how_to_step_six: Click ‘Save and Download’ to download your rotated PDF.
how_to_step_five: Add more files or delete pages, if needed.
how_to_step_four: Preview the rotated PDF using the built-in PDF viewer.
how_to_step_one: Click on the 'Choose File' button and select or drag and drop the PDF file(s) into the tool.
how_to_step_three: Choose the direction of rotation and click the 'Rotate Left' or 'Rotate Right' button to apply the rotation.
how_to_step_two: Select the page(s) you want to rotate.
how_to_title: How to Rotate PDF File Online for Free.
feature_five_text: This tool is designed for all users, advanced knowledge is not required. So, It's easy to rotate PDF files.
feature_four_text: Working with Rotate PDF is absolutely secure. The entire process of rotating PDF files happens on the client side (directly in your browser), no third parties can access your data.
feature_one_text: You can use this Rotate PDF pages tool online for free and with no limits on the number of times you can use it to rotate PDF files.
feature_six_text: You can access or use the Rotate PDF pages online on the Internet using any browser from any operating system.
feature_three_text: This tool enables you to rotate and delete PDF pages, giving you complete control over the final document before saving it.
feature_two_text: Thanks to its powerful rotation processing capabilities, this tool is able to rotate multiple PDF files in a shorter amount of time.
page_header_text: Rotate your PDFs online for free. You can select one or multiple pages and rotate them at once!
